name: Sanctuary
description:
mood piece / walking simulator

"Eerie, lonesome exploration of a land that shares a similar sense of enormity and mystery to Ico's abandoned fortress. Crossing the bridge with the wind whistling in your ears is a highlight."

– Chris Priestman

"The sense of scale here seems to be quite interesting. Also, what is up with these cubes?"

– RockLeeSmile

"This is a really cool game. Like if Proteus looked like an Ico/Silent Hill mashup."

– Brendon Keogh
